featured.text: John has been scolded by his boss for over ten minutes now.
The boss then laughingly pointed out that the same proposal had been made and 34 some minutes before.

definition.zh_def: 主管或雇主，負責管理或指導他人的人。
definition.en_def: A person who is in charge of a worker or organization.
definition.example: My boss asked me to complete the report by Friday.
